labs.title: Charts (1 of 3) - Adding a Pie Chart
labs.description: This tutorial shows you how to create a pie chart in a new page in an application.

labs.title: Charts (2 of 3) - Adding a Bar Chart
labs.description: This 15-minute tutorial shows you how to edit a chart.

labs.title: Charts (3 of 3) - Changing Chart Appearance with JavaScript
labs.description: This 5-minute tutorial shows you how to create a custom JavaScript to change the appearance of a chart.
